languages.text: "Джиневри?" {n}Стальной голос Иокасты заставляет всех замереть. В нем слышатся нотки недоумения.{/n} "Разберемся с ней после. А я лично займусь поисками Гведона. Лорд-капитан, прикажете казнить этого "демонопоклонника"?"

"Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"
languages.original_text: "Джиневри?" {n}Стальной голос Иокасты заставляет всех замереть. В нем слышатся нотки недоумения.{/n} "Разберемся с ней после. А я лично займусь поисками Гведона. Лорд-капитан, прикажете казнить этого "демонопоклонника"?"

traits.locale_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

"Hrotko!" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze.{/n} "We will deal with you and your wiles later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

"Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

languages.text: « Jinevri ? » {n}Tous s'immobilisent subitement devant la voix menaçante de Sauerback, dans laquelle vous décelez également un soupçon de stupéfaction.{/n} « Nous nous occuperons de son cas en temps voulu. Pour l'heure, je vais me charger de retrouver ce Gwedon. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, voulez-vous qu'on exécute cet "adorateur de démons" ? »
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

traits.locale_text: « Jinevri ? » {n}Tous s'immobilisent subitement devant la voix menaçante de Sauerback, dans laquelle vous décelez également un soupçon de stupéfaction.{/n} « Nous nous occuperons de son cas en temps voulu. Pour l'heure, je vais me charger de retrouver ce Gwedon. {mf|Seigneur-capitaine|Seigneure-capitaine}, voulez-vous qu'on exécute cet "adorateur de démons" ? »

languages.text: «¿Jinevri?». {n}El tono cortante de la voz de Sauerback inmoviliza a todos los presentes, aunque percibes también un tono de perplejidad.{/n} «Ya nos ocuparemos de ella más adelante. Dirigiré personalmente la búsqueda de Gwedon. Lord Capitán, ¿quiere que ejecutemos a este "adorador de daemons"?».
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Jinevri?». {n}El tono cortante de la voz de Sauerback inmoviliza a todos los presentes, aunque percibes también un tono de perplejidad.{/n} «Ya nos ocuparemos de ella más adelante. Dirigiré personalmente la búsqueda de Gwedon. Lord Capitán, ¿quiere que ejecutemos a este "adorador de daemons"?».

languages.text: “杰尼娃？”{n}苏尔贝克的声音宛如钢铁一般尖锐，但你却听到了一丝困惑的意味。{/n}“我们之后再决定怎么处理她，我要亲自找到这个叫戈登的人。至于这个‘恶魔崇拜者’，您希望我们将他处决吗，舰长大人？”
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

traits.locale_text: “杰尼娃？”{n}苏尔贝克的声音宛如钢铁一般尖锐，但你却听到了一丝困惑的意味。{/n}“我们之后再决定怎么处理她，我要亲自找到这个叫戈登的人。至于这个‘恶魔崇拜者’，您希望我们将他处决吗，舰长大人？”

languages.text: 「ジネヴリ？」{n}ザウアーバックの険しい声に、その場にいた全員が凍りついた。しかし、同時に困惑の声も聞こえてくる。{/n}「彼女の件は後で対処するので、グウェドンの捜索は私に任せてください。ロード・キャプテン、このディーモン崇拝者を処罰させてくれませんか？」
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

traits.locale_text: 「ジネヴリ？」{n}ザウアーバックの険しい声に、その場にいた全員が凍りついた。しかし、同時に困惑の声も聞こえてくる。{/n}「彼女の件は後で対処するので、グウェドンの捜索は私に任せてください。ロード・キャプテン、このディーモン崇拝者を処罰させてくれませんか？」

languages.text: "Jinevri?" {n}Die Kälte in Sauerbacks Stimme lässt alle Anwesenden erstarren, aber du erkennst auch einen Anflug von Verunsicherung.{/n} "Wir befassen uns später mit ihr. Ich kümmere mich selbst um die Suche nach Gwedon. Lord Captain, sollen wir diesen 'Dämonenanbeter' exekutieren?"
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"

traits.locale_text: "Jinevri?" {n}Die Kälte in Sauerbacks Stimme lässt alle Anwesenden erstarren, aber du erkennst auch einen Anflug von Verunsicherung.{/n} "Wir befassen uns später mit ihr. Ich kümmere mich selbst um die Suche nach Gwedon. Lord Captain, sollen wir diesen 'Dämonenanbeter' exekutieren?"

languages.text: "Jinevri mi?" {n}Sauerback'in bıçak gibi keskin ses tonu, mevcut bulunan herkesin donakalmasına neden oluyor. Ancak sesinde bir miktar şaşkınlık olduğuna da fark ediyorsun.{/n} "Onunla sonra ilgileniriz. Gwedon'u arayışımızı bizzat yöneteceğim. Lord Kaptan, bu 'iblis müridini' infaz etmemizi ister misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "Jinevri?" {n}The steely edge in Sauerback's voice causes everyone present to freeze, but you also hear a note of bewilderment.{/n} "We will deal with her later. I will handle the search for Gwedon myself. Lord Captain, would you have us execute this 'daemon worshipper'?"
